analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ
analyzed: pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pīti sahagata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pīti sahagatam dhamma

original: paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca

original: napītisahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ
analyzed: na pīti sahagataḥ ca na upekkhā sahagataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pīti sahagata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ ca na upekkhā sahagataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ ca na sukha sahagataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato
analyzed: hetu paccayā pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ ca na sukha sahagataḥ ca na upekkhā sahagataḥ

original: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta.
analyzed: sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pīti sahagatam ca sukha sahagatam ca dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe avigate aṭṭhavīsa
sahajāta vāram pi pe sampayutta vāram pi pañhā vāram pi sabbattha vitthāretabba
